title: What kind of printer does not use ink cartridges? - Quora

response.answer_text: What kind of printer does not use ink cartridges? Laser printers don’t use ink. They use toner. (Toner is essentially a plastic powder that is melted into the paper.) Thermal printers use no consumables. They print using heat, but they require special thermal paper. Old-fashioned dot-matrix and impact printers don’t use liquid ink, but rather use a ribbon that is impregnated with ink that is transferred to the paper by impact.
